name: FOR EVER A NONSMOKER!
description:
Smoking withdrawal: group hypnosis with Jafeth Mariani

The therapist and professor Jafeth Mariani, who is well known in Germany, is coming to the Europahaus Mayrhofen for a smoking withdrawal.
Everyone who has the will to free himself from his vice is invited to participate in the symposium with subsequent group hypnosis.
Limited number of participants!

For those who are interested, he is still available on 14th June 2017 for a single session.

Start: 8.30 p.m. | Inlet: 8.00 p.m.
Admission: € 49,00 (including € 1,50 pre-sale fee)
free choice of seatings!
